readme: Chronological by date of first commit: add yourself at the end

contributors.name: Andrew Morrow
contributors.description: Project architect and team lead. Library structure, interface design, coding conventions, build system, versioning model, C++11 usage, etc.

contributors.name: Tyler Brock
contributors.description: Principle author of mongocxx library CRUD interfaces and unit tests.

contributors.name: Samantha Ritter
contributors.description: View_or_value variant types, bsoncxx error handling, various features and bug fixes.

contributors.name: Mark Benvenuto
contributors.description: Windows Support, Clang-Format Integration, AppVeyor Integration.
